category.motivation: The article describes a U.S. military strike on a Venezuelan vessel, constituting a geopolitical event involving state actors and cross-border conflict.

article_node.title: Trump says U.S. has carried out strike against drug-carrying vessel that departed from Venezuela
article_node.summary: President Donald Trump announced that the U.S. struck a drug‑laden vessel that had departed from Venezuela, describing the operation as a lethal strike against a narco‑terrorist organization. The U.S. has increased maritime forces off Venezuela to counter drug cartels, while Venezuelan President Nicolás Maduro denounced the action as a false narrative aimed at destabilizing his government. No further details were provided by the Pentagon or the U.S. State Department.
